fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: You have the goal of a random neutral benign +abilities and attributes (this isnt the same as wincon)

fields.name: Attributes (extra):
fields.value:
- Your attack  is always none, your defense is none unless you have to defend yourself to goal (eg: block 5 attacks as goal)
- If the neutral benign requires you to kill; then the  check will be done to see if you can kill them or not (eg: they are killed and immidiately revived without reveal)
- If the neutral benign requires you to stay alive : It is instead changed to start of day 5
- If the neutral benign requires you to defend yourself against attacks; It works as normal (your defense is changed)
- If its an investigative, This should be fine but host can modify if needed
- Otherwise ;Host can modify the neutral benign goal/role so it can work more properly; Or reroll to another neutral benign
- Your wincon is  town wincon but once you complete the neutral benign goal, you get a free single shot retributionist revive (the old version/301)
